Unnerving Boast.name: Unnerving Boast
Unnerving Boast.flavor: Your terrifying avowal echoes in the hollow and short future your enemies now expect as you come for them.
Unnerving Boast.trigger: When you bloody a foe, or reduce a foe to 0 hp
Unnerving Boast.special: Increase to Charisma +6 vs. Will at 21st level.

Quickened Coercion.name: Quickened Coercion
Quickened Coercion.flavor: With hateful glares, biting words, and bloody evidence, you quickly cow your foes and prove their inferiority.
Quickened Coercion.effect: You can make an Intimidate check against an enemyâ€™s Will defense. If you succeed, you gain combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.
Quickened Coercion.special: If you score a critical hit with any attack, you regain the use of this power.

Doomcaller's Promise.name: Doomcaller's Promise
Doomcaller's Promise.flavor: You bring your enemies to a standstill with your ritual boasting, giving you and your allies a window of opportunity.
Doomcaller's Promise.trigger: When you bloody a foe or reduce a foe to 0 hp
Doomcaller's Promise.onHit: 2d10 + Charisma modifier psychic damage, and the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both).
